Damage Indicator Font Size Modifier [Ralf]
045CA1C0 xxxxxxxx

xxxxxxxx = Font Size (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: 3FB33333 = 1.4)

Large Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045CA1C0 3FCCCCCD

Small Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045CA1C0 3FA00000

Ultra Small Damage Indicator Font [Ralf]
045CA1C0 3F800000


Damage Indicator Scroll Speed Modifier [Ralf]
045CA1F0 xxxxxxxx

xxxxxxxx = Scroll Speed (IEEE-754 SP Floating-Point Number, Default: BFB33333 = -1.4)

Fast Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045CA1F0 C0000000

Slow Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045CA1F0 BF800000

Disable Damage Indicator Scrolling [Ralf]
045CA1F0 00000000

042184FC 4800000C
E2000001 80008000

Use this code to play unencrypted, PRS compressed Download Quests.

Download Quests: Decryption Key Saver [Ralf]
20218318 807F0024
0600B010 00000028
801D0048 3C608051
8063D01C 7C030000
40820010 9421FFF0
4820C489 907E001C
38610008 481D6784
041E17B4 4BE2985C
E2000001 80008000

This code generates Download Quests with embedded decryption key when
you download the quest files from a server. Note that such downloaded
quest files contain your actual PSO serial number and may compromise
your PSO server credentials.
